please wait about 8 minutes between question iterations
We've heard you, it's just that the answer isn't known
I don't have time to wait, I've had problems with ubuntu for 2 days !!
we're not being paid to offer support, so you're going to have to hold your horses, my first Linux install took 2 weeks of tweaking to get the bare essentials working ;)
lol well it worked on my old system without any problems
as long as the network is powered by DHCP, Ethernet would work wonders
I don't think it can detect my ethernet card :-/
well, a $5 Ethernet card I picked up from Comp-USA, simple Yum-Cha Comp-USA brand, works fine
So if I put my old ethernet card in that worked with Linux it should work ?
yeahp
good I'll go get it and install it :P
